OOC: Um SkarBlaise fired six shots at Rage would you post the damage?

::Skar Blaise::
    "So you're not dead yet maybe this will help."  He did something very 
stupid and altered his guns back into the large missile launcher normally 
used in tank mode.  He lets out a very loud laugh and fires a very, very, 
large missile aimed directly at Rage's chest.  Unfortunately he was too 
stupid to realize the reason it should only be used in tank mode.  The one 
shot launched him backwards approximately a hundred yards and crushed him 
into the ground dislodging Skar who fell to the ground in a stasis lock.

::Knok::
    During this time Knok had slowly climbed up the cliff and followed the 
obvious tracks of Blaise.  Curious about the battle he had snuck up to where 
SkarBlaise landed moments later.  He climbed on top of Blaise's now unmoving 
body and placed himself where Skar had been.

::KnokBlaise::
    He stood up and his first order of business was to shout to Rage "Stop!  
Don't hurt me.  I am no longer your enemy."
